content: Why is there so much ignorance about what is obviously the most ‘accurate’ and so obviously best projection? That is Buckminster Fuller’s Dymaxion projection. But also the most interesting projection (in that it makes no pretence about our living in a Flat Earth Society, but makes us think about the globe — eg understand why flying in a straight line from Tokyo to Oslo we might not make a straight line on any of your various projections! Try it on your maps.) — The Dymaxion projection makes us think. Oh, difficult.
